text: Candye Kane, born Candace Hogan (November 13, 1961 - May 6, 2016), was an American singer-songwriter of Jewish descent. She was best known in the blues and jazz genre.This was although she also recorded country western songs and was mentioned in several guides to California Country music. She was included in the books Rolling Stone Guide to Jazz and Blues, Elwood's Blues by Dan Aykroyd. She also had a career as a pornographic actress during porn's golden age.Candye Kane: A Blues Singer With a Past | Tonic â€“ Inspiring News Stories & Social Good. Tonic.com (June 30, 2008). She was born in Ventura, California.Candye Kane Big Tit Pictures, Movies and Biography!. Lanasbigboobs.com (November 13, 1965). In 2014, Kane was nominated for a Blues Music Award in the 'Contemporary Blues Female Artist of the Year' category. Kane was a bisexual. In 2008, she was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer. Kane died from the disease at the Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles on May 6, 2016, aged 54. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Ventura County, California Category:American activists Category:American LGBT sex industry people Category:Philanthropists from California Category:American pornographic actors Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Bisexual Jews Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Jewish philanthropists Category:Jewish sex industry people Category:LGBT people from California Category:LGBT pornographic actors Category:LGBT singers Category:Singers from California Category:People from Ventura, California
